text: Carlos Gómez Álava, known as Carlos Gómez, is a Filipino writer in Spanish best known for his book of poems Excelsitudes. Nick Joaquin called him "the last Filipino writer in Spanish". ==References== Category:Spanish-language writers of the Philippines Category:20th-century Filipino poets Category:Writers from Bulacan Category:University of Santo Tomas alumni Category:Complutense University of Madrid alumni Category:Filipino male poets Category:1926 births Category:1988 deaths Category:20th-century male writers
title: Carlos Gómez Álava
